name: The Hauntings of Prairie Dawn
description:
The wicked ghost Prairie Dawn has taken over your school! Pick up your magical pencil and fight back against her waves of minions. If you defeat enough, Dawn will appear to fight you herself...

Please, if you rate this game, make sure to play until the boss-fight to get the full experience.

The desks and other obstacles in the school really make it feel "confined" to move around in.

controls:

shift-run, WASD - move, click - shoot

other buttons:

bottom left corner in the menu - difficulty settings, top left corner in game - pause button

Try to beat Prairie on Insanity difficulty. I'm not sure it's possible. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

NOTE - must play in fullscreen to work :)

-Windows Downloads-

Game works better on Windows than WebGL.

https://turbofloof-games.itch.io/hauntings-of-prairie-dawn-downloads

Tell me if there are any suggestions you have to make the game feel better!
